extension.welcome: Transform your web browsing experience using AI with Shinkai Visor ✨

homepage.welcomeTitle: How can I help you today?
homepage.agentConfigurationRequired: {{agentName}} requires some configurations to work properly.

desktop.welcomeDescription: Shinkai lets you build AI agents in minutes — fast, private, and secure. Run locally, collaborate through a decentralized network, and create AI workflows effortlessly.

benefits.local: Local: With a local Shinkai, you gain complete control over your data in a secure environment.
benefits.privacy: Privacy-Focused: Your data remains secure with offline capabilities and strong privacy protections.
benefits.tools: Tools for Everyday Tasks: Supports 100+ integrations and counting.

embeddingBenefits.efficient: Compact Size & Efficient: With only 22 million parameters and a 384-dimensional embedding vector, the Arctic-embed-xs is designed to be resource-efficient.
embeddingBenefits.highRetrieval: High Retrieval Performance: It can effectively retrieve relevant information from large datasets, with high accuracy in search and retrieval tasks.
embeddingBenefits.dataAnalysis: Improved Data Analysis: Extract meaningful insights from unstructured data, improving decision-making processes and operational efficiency.

gemmaBenefits.performance: High Performance in a Compact Size:The gemma2:2b model is designed to deliver class-leading performance while maintaining a relatively small size of 2 billion parameters.
gemmaBenefits.fast: Fast Execution: Users have noted that it runs efficiently on mid-range hardware, enabling faster responses and smoother interactions without significant lag.
gemmaBenefits.lightweight: Lightweight:This lightweight nature means it requires less memory and computational power, making it accessible for a wider range of users and applications.

ollamaBenefits.resource: Efficient Resource Usage: It's a light-weight, ultra-fast model compared to larger models.
ollamaBenefits.language: Powerful Language Generation: Generate human-like text across a variety of applications such as content generation, language translation, and coding assistance.
ollamaBenefits.multilingual: Multilingual Support: The model supports dialogues in multiple languages including English, Spanish, French, German and more

commandr7bBenefits.performance: High Performance in a Compact Size: The command-r7b model is designed to deliver excellent performance while maintaining a relatively small size.
commandr7bBenefits.fast: Fast Execution: Users have noted that it runs efficiently on mid-range hardware, enabling faster responses and smoother interactions without significant lag.
commandr7bBenefits.lightweight: Lightweight: This lightweight nature means it requires less memory and computational power, making it accessible for a wider range of users and applications.

mistralSmallBenefits.resource: Efficient Resource Usage: It's a light-weight, ultra-fast model compared to larger models.
mistralSmallBenefits.language: Powerful Language Generation: Generate human-like text across a variety of applications such as content generation, language translation, and coding assistance.
mistralSmallBenefits.multilingual: Multilingual Support: The model supports dialogues in multiple languages including English, Spanish, French, German and more

quickAsk.emptyStateDescription: Try "How to make a HTTP request in JavaScript" , "Give me the top 10 rock music in the 80s", "Explain me how internet works"

form.message: Tell us the job you want to do

vectorFs.label: AI Files Explorer

actions.uploadFileText: Uploading your files transforms them to be AI-ready and available to use in Shinkai.
actions.shareFolderText: You can share folders that you store in AI Files with anyone.
actions.unshareFolderText:
Everyone will be removed from this folder. You'll still keep a copy of this folder in your AI Files.
Note: Removed members will keep a copy of this shared folder.

emptyState.noFilesAndFolders: This will be the home for all your files.

emptyState.noSharedFolders: Your shared folders will be displayed here.

resetNodeWarning.title: Unable to connect
resetNodeWarning.description: Your Shinkai Node is currently locked by existing keys. To connect again, you can reset all your Shinkai Node data.
resetNodeWarning.option1: Restore: Try to restore your connection using a backed up keys.
resetNodeWarning.option2: Reset Data: Permanently delete all your Shinkai Node data.
resetNodeWarning.option3: Reset All: Permanently delete all your Shinkai Node data including the encryption and signing keys.

remoteAccess.title: Remote Access
remoteAccess.description: Easily and securely connect to your Shinkai node from anywhere using ngrok. No complex setup—just create a free ngrok account, copy your ngrok auth token from the dashboard, and paste it below to enable secure remote access.
remoteAccess.publicAccessURLDescription: Use this URL to connect to your node from anywhere.

mcpClients.customDescriptionSecondary: If your client does not support SSE, you can run the Shinkai MCP server as a separate process using this command:

feedback.description: We value your feedback! Please let us know your thoughts about Shinkai and how we can improve your experience.

form.contactHelp: How can we reach you if we have questions?

form.success: Thank you for your feedback! We will get back to you soon.

agents.label: Agents
agents.createFirstAgent: Create your first Agent to start exploring the power of AI.

form.emptyChatDescription: Send a message to start chatting with this agent

create.agentNameHelperEdit: You can change the agent name, but the agent ID remains unchanged. Agent ID: {{agentName}}
create.agentNameHelperCreate: Enter a unique name for your AI agent. This will also be used as the agent ID {{agentName}}
create.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g., Create user-centered designs and improve user interactions.
create.descriptionHelper: Briefly describe your agent’s purpose (not used by the agent).
create.systemInstructionsPlaceholder: e.g., You are a helpful assistant that can answer questions and help with tasks.
create.systemInstructionsHelper: Control your agents behavior by adding custom instructions
create.llmProviderDescription: Choose the model that will power your agent
create.messageContextDescription: (Optional) You can control the message context here by forcing a static message with the user message e.g. {{user_message}}. And then say: Chao amigo!. This will add "And then say: Chao amigo!" to every message sent.
create.enableStreamDescription: Streams the agent's response as it generates
create.enableToolsDescription: Allows the agent to use tools to complete tasks.
create.temperatureDescription: Temperature is a parameter that affects the randomness of AI outputs. Higher temp = more unexpected, lower temp = more predictable.
create.topPDescription: Adjust the probability threshold to increase the relevance of results. For example, a threshold of 0.9 could be optimal for targeted, specific applications, whereas a threshold of 0.95 or 0.97 might be preferred for tasks that require broader, more creative responses.
create.topKDescription: Adjust the count of key words for creating sequences. This parameter governs the extent of the generated passage, forestalling too much repetition. Selecting a higher figure yields longer narratives, whereas a smaller figure keeps the text brief.
create.knowledgeBaseDescription: Provide your agent with local AI files to enhance its knowledge and capabilities.
create.toolsDescription: Select which tools & skills your agent can use to complete tasks.
create.scheduleDescription: Set when your agent will automatically run tasks.
create.scheduleNormalUsageDescription: Agent is ready to respond immediately when used upon in a chat.
create.scheduleRecurringDescription: Normal usage and also configure specific times and frequencies for agent tasks e.g. Twitter Agent that performs a workflow like checking and answering messages every 5 minutes.
create.scheduleAIInstructionsDescription: Enter AI instructions for the scheduled execution...
create.scheduleAIInstructionsHelper: Write the prompt that will be used for the scheduled execution.
create.cronExpressionHelper: Enter a cron expression eg: */30 * * * * (every 30 min)

agentsPage.description:
Create and explore AI agents with personalized instructions, enriched knowledge,
diverse task capabilities, and more to tackle your goals autonomously.
agentsPage.exploreDescription:
Discover and install AI agents from the community to enhance your workflow
and supercharge your productivity and creativity.
agentsPage.notFoundDescription: Create your first Agent to start exploring the power of AI.
agentsPage.exploreAgentsDescription: Explore custom AI agents for your needs

aisPage.label: AI Models
aisPage.shortDescription: Explore a wide range of AI models
aisPage.description:
Easily manage both cloud and local AI models,
switching between them seamlessly to fit your workflow.

tasksPage.noTasksDescription: Create your first scheduled task to automate reminders, summaries, or any other tasks you need to manage

networkAgentsPage.descriptionNetwork: Discover and deploy AI agents from the global network. Each agent operates autonomously and can be integrated into your workflows. Pay per use or deploy agents for others to access.
networkAgentsPage.descriptionPublished: Publish your AI agents to the network. Each agent operates autonomously and can be integrated into your workflows. Pay per use or deploy agents for others to access.
networkAgentsPage.addedDescription: {{name}} is now in your collection. Start a chat to use it!
networkAgentsPage.setupRequired: Setup required to use paid agents
networkAgentsPage.registerShinkaiIdentityDescription: Create your unique identity on the Shinkai network to use and publish agents
networkAgentsPage.connectWalletDescription: Connect your wallet to pay for agent usage and receive earnings from your published agents
networkAgentsPage.costPerUseDescription: Pay each time you use this agent
networkAgentsPage.howPaymentsWorkDescription: When you use this agent, you'll be prompted to confirm the payment from your connected wallet. Payments are processed on the {{network}} network.
networkAgentsPage.toolPaymentRequiredDescription: This tool requires payment to use.
networkAgentsPage.author: Author
networkAgentsPage.pleaseWait: Please wait while we process your transaction...
networkAgentsPage.paymentSuccessfulDescription: Your payment went through successfully. The tool is now executing...

mcpPage.mcpServersDescription:
Connect to an MCP server to instantly tap into external data sources and tools—like live weather updates, stock prices, or translation services—without building custom integrations.
This expands your system's capabilities with real-time information and easy access to new resources as your needs grow.
mcpPage.exposeToolsDescription:
Expose your AI Tools through MCP to enable seamless integration with other MCP Clients 
and expand their capabilities.
mcpPage.helpfulLinks: You can find helpful MCPs to connect with Shinkai at smithery.ai and composio.dev.

videoBanner.unsupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

appReset.title: App Reset Required
appReset.description: We're currently in beta and we made some significant updates to improve your experience. To apply these updates, we need to reset your data. If you need assistance, please contact our support team.

playgroundTool.metadataError: Tool metadata failed. Try generating again.
playgroundTool.prismError: The code editor encountered an error.

prompt.libraryDescription: Choose a prompt from the library to get started.

cronTask.taskDescriptionHelper: Briefly describe your agent's purpose (not used by the agent).
cronTask.promptPlaceholder: e.g. Give me top hacker news stories
cronTask.promptExample: e.g. Give me top hacker news stories
cronTask.cronExample: Enter a cron expression eg: */30 * * * * (every 30 min)
cronTask.temperatureInfo: Temperature is a parameter that affects the randomness of AI outputs. Higher temp = more unexpected, lower temp = more predictable.
cronTask.topPInfo: Adjust the probability threshold to increase the relevance of results. For example, a threshold of 0.9 could be optimal for targeted, specific applications, whereas a threshold of 0.95 or 0.97 might be preferred for tasks that require broader, more creative responses.
cronTask.topKInfo: Adjust the count of key words for creating sequences. This parameter governs the extent of the generated passage, forestalling too much repetition. Selecting a higher figure yields longer narratives, whereas a smaller figure keeps the text brief.

dockerStatus.dockerNotInstalledDescription: Docker is not installed on your system. Installing it will unlock better performance, faster processing, and an improved AI tool experience.
dockerStatus.dockerInstalledButNotRunningDescription: Docker is installed but not running. Start it now to improve tool execution speed, stability, and overall performance.
dockerStatus.dockerRunningDescription: Your tools are now running at full efficiency with Docker. Enjoy a smoother experience!
